title: Joint Secretary
description: Leading organizational operations and strategic initiatives for environmental welfare activities at TIET.
responsibilities: Oversee organizational operations and strategic planning
Coordinate cross-functional teams for environmental initiatives

title: Head of Logistics
description: Managed end-to-end logistics operations for large-scale environmental events and campaigns.
responsibilities: Coordinated logistics for 10+ major environmental events
Managed distribution and resource allocation across campus
Led a team of volunteers for event execution
Optimized supply chain processes for sustainability initiatives

title: Core Member
description: Contributing to the organization and execution of TEDx events, managing logistics and creative operations.
responsibilities: Coordinate logistics for TEDx events and speaker sessions
Collaborate on creative content and event branding
Manage event operations and attendee experience
Support team in delivering high-impact talks and experiences

title: Core Member
description: Driving energy conservation awareness and sustainable practices across the campus community.
responsibilities: Collaborate with campus administration on green initiatives
